description: This CSS file defines styles for a theme management system and the layout of an App component, including responsive design features and animations.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling including layout and theming.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling for application with responsive design.

classes.description: Styling for links in the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button styling for toggling themes within the application.
